title: China’s Renewable Energy Revolution Is a Huge Mess That Might Save the World
full_text: China’s Renewable Energy Revolution Is a Huge Mess That Might Save the World. A global onslaught of cheap Chinese green power is upending everything in its path. No one is ready for its repercussions.. Indeed, the greatest beneficiaries of Chinas renewables revolution may, in fact, be consumers, both inside and outside of China. In sun-blessed Australia, where rooftop solar panels sit atop nearly a… [+3396 chars]
